title: Rainy city driving, almost stopped at intersection
caption: Red car driving in the rain, stopping at intersection with police car.

reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly and stopping at the intersection because of the rainy weather, which reduces visibility and makes it harder to judge distances. The police car is also present at the intersection, which may contribute to the ego vehicle's cautious behavior.
